description: Smallest number x such that sum of divisors of x is n!.
comments: For n = 1, a(1) = 1; for n = 2, there is no solution.
references: R. K. Guy (1981): Unsolved Problems In Number Theory, B39.
links: Max A. Alekseyev, Computing the (number of) inverses of Euler's totient and other multiplicative functions, arXiv preprint arXiv:1401.6054, 2014
formula: a(n) = Min{x; Sigma[x] = n!} = Min{x; A000203(x) = A000142(n)}
author: _Labos Elemer_, Jun 28 2000
extensions: a(13), a(14) from _Vim Wenders_, Nov 06 2006, Jan 12 2007
a(15), a(16) from _Donovan Johnson_, Aug 26 2008, Mar 26 2010
